BELCH.description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

GUNKSHOT.name: Gunk Shot
GUNKSHOT.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target.

SLUDGEWAVE.name: Sludge Wave
SLUDGEWAVE.description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

SHELLSIDEARM.name: Shell Side Arm
SHELLSIDEARM.description: Inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. May also poison the target.

SLUDGEBOMB.name: Sludge Bomb
SLUDGEBOMB.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

POISONJAB.name: Poison Jab
POISONJAB.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm seeped with poison. It may also poison the target.

CROSSPOISON.name: Cross Poison
CROSSPOISON.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the foe. Critical hits land more easily.

SLUDGE.name: Sludge
SLUDGE.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

VENOSHOCK.name: Venoshock
VENOSHOCK.description: The user drenches the foe in a special poisonous liquid. Its power doubles if the target is poisoned.

CLEARSMOG.name: Clear Smog
CLEARSMOG.description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

POISONFANG.name: Poison Fang
POISONFANG.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.

POISONTAIL.name: Poison Tail
POISONTAIL.description: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

ACID.name: Acid
ACID.description: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

ACIDSPRAY.name: Acid Spray
ACIDSPRAY.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

SMOG.name: Smog
SMOG.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

POISONSTING.name: Poison Sting
POISONSTING.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

ACIDARMOR.name: Acid Armor
ACIDARMOR.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

BANEFULBUNKER.name: Baneful Bunker
BANEFULBUNKER.description: Protects the user from attacks. Also poisons any attacker that makes contact with the user.

COIL.name: Coil
COIL.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

CORROSIVEGAS.name: Corrosive Gas
CORROSIVEGAS.description: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

GASTROACID.name: Gastro Acid
GASTROACID.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid negates the effect of the target's Ability.

POISONGAS.name: Poison Gas
POISONGAS.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

POISONPOWDER.name: Poison Powder
POISONPOWDER.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

PURIFY.name: Purify
PURIFY.description: The user heals the target's status condition. If so, it also restores the user's own HP.

TOXIC.name: Toxic
TOXIC.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

TOXICSPIKES.name: Toxic Spikes
TOXICSPIKES.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe's feet. They poison foes that switch into battle.

TOXICTHREAD.name: Toxic Thread
TOXICTHREAD.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

VENOMDRENCH.name: Venom Drench
VENOMDRENCH.description: Foes are drenched in an odd liquid that lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed of poisoned Pokémon.

PRISMATICLASER.name: Prismatic Laser
PRISMATICLASER.description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

PSYCHOBOOST.name: Psycho Boost
PSYCHOBOOST.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

FUTURESIGHT.name: Future Sight
FUTURESIGHT.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

SYNCHRONOISE.name: Synchronoise
SYNCHRONOISE.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user damages any Pokémon of the same type as the user.

DREAMEATER.name: Dream Eater
DREAMEATER.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.

PHOTONGEYSER.name: Photon Geyser
PHOTONGEYSER.description: The user attacks with a pillar of light. This move the higher of the user's Attack or Sp. Atk stat.

PSYSTRIKE.name: Psystrike
PSYSTRIKE.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

FREEZINGGLARE.name: Freezing Glare
FREEZINGGLARE.description: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

PSYCHIC.name: Psychic
PSYCHIC.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

PSYCHICFANGS.name: Psychic Fangs
PSYCHICFANGS.description: The user bites the target using psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

EERIESPELL.name: Eerie Spell
EERIESPELL.description: The user attacks with tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

EXPANDINGFORCE.name: Expanding Force
EXPANDINGFORCE.description: The user attacks the target with psychic power. Powers up and hits all foes on Psychic Terrain.

EXTRASENSORY.name: Extrasensory
EXTRASENSORY.description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the target flinch.

HYPERSPACEHOLE.name: Hyperspace Hole
HYPERSPACEHOLE.description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. Skips protections.

PSYSHOCK.name: Psyshock
PSYSHOCK.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

ZENHEADBUTT.name: Zen Headbutt
ZENHEADBUTT.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

LUSTERPURGE.name: Luster Purge
LUSTERPURGE.description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

MISTBALL.name: Mist Ball
MISTBALL.description: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Atk.

PSYCHOCUT.name: Psycho Cut
PSYCHOCUT.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

PSYBEAM.name: Psybeam
PSYBEAM.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

HEARTSTAMP.name: Heart Stamp
HEARTSTAMP.description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the foe less wary. It may also cause flinching.

CONFUSION.name: Confusion
CONFUSION.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

STOREDPOWER.name: Stored Power
STOREDPOWER.description: The user attacks with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage.

MIRRORCOAT.name: Mirror Coat
MIRRORCOAT.description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

PSYWAVE.name: Psywave
PSYWAVE.description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

AGILITY.name: Agility
AGILITY.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

ALLYSWITCH.name: Ally Switch
ALLYSWITCH.description: The user switches places with an ally. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

AMNESIA.name: Amnesia
AMNESIA.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

BARRIER.name: Barrier
BARRIER.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

CALMMIND.name: Calm Mind
CALMMIND.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

COSMICPOWER.name: Cosmic Power
COSMICPOWER.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

GRAVITY.name: Gravity
GRAVITY.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation.

GUARDSPLIT.name: Guard Split
GUARDSPLIT.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target.

GUARDSWAP.name: Guard Swap
GUARDSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

HEALBLOCK.name: Heal Block
HEALBLOCK.description: For five turns, the foe is prevented from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

HEALPULSE.name: Heal Pulse
HEALPULSE.description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

HEALINGWISH.name: Healing Wish
HEALINGWISH.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

HEARTSWAP.name: Heart Swap
HEARTSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

HYPNOSIS.name: Hypnosis
HYPNOSIS.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

IMPRISON.name: Imprison
IMPRISON.description: If the foe knows any move also known by the user, the foe is prevented from using it.

INSTRUCT.name: Instruct
INSTRUCT.description: The user instructs the target to use the target's last move again.

KINESIS.name: Kinesis
KINESIS.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. It lowers the target's accuracy.

LIGHTSCREEN.name: Light Screen
LIGHTSCREEN.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

LUNARDANCE.name: Lunar Dance
LUNARDANCE.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

MAGICCOAT.name: Magic Coat
MAGICCOAT.description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

MAGICPOWDER.name: Magic Powder
MAGICPOWDER.description: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

MAGICROOM.name: Magic Room
MAGICROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

MEDITATE.name: Meditate
MEDITATE.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

MIRACLEEYE.name: Miracle Eye
MIRACLEEYE.description: Enables the user to hit a Dark type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

POWERSPLIT.name: Power Split
POWERSPLIT.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

POWERSWAP.name: Power Swap
POWERSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

POWERTRICK.name: Power Trick
POWERTRICK.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

PSYCHICTERRAIN.name: Psychic Terrain
PSYCHICTERRAIN.description: Protects grounded Pokémon from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

PSYCHOSHIFT.name: Psycho Shift
PSYCHOSHIFT.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

REFLECT.name: Reflect
REFLECT.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

REST.name: Rest
REST.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

ROLEPLAY.name: Role Play
ROLEPLAY.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

SKILLSWAP.name: Skill Swap
SKILLSWAP.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

SPEEDSWAP.name: Speed Swap
SPEEDSWAP.description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

TELEKINESIS.name: Telekinesis
TELEKINESIS.description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

TELEPORT.name: Teleport
TELEPORT.description: The user switches place with a party Pokémon. Also warps to the last Pokémon Center visited.

TRICK.name: Trick
TRICK.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

TRICKROOM.name: Trick Room
TRICKROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

WONDERROOM.name: Wonder Room
WONDERROOM.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for 5 turns.

HEADSMASH.name: Head Smash
HEADSMASH.description: The user attacks the foe with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. The user also takes terrible damage.

ROCKWRECKER.name: Rock Wrecker
ROCKWRECKER.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

METEORBEAM.name: Meteor Beam
METEORBEAM.description: Gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat on the first turn, attacks on the next turn.

DIAMONDSTORM.name: Diamond Storm
DIAMONDSTORM.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage foes. This may also sharply raise the user's Defense stat.

STONEEDGE.name: Stone Edge
STONEEDGE.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

POWERGEM.name: Power Gem
POWERGEM.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

ROCKSLIDE.name: Rock Slide
ROCKSLIDE.description: Large boulders are hurled at the foes to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

ANCIENTPOWER.name: Ancient Power
ANCIENTPOWER.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

ROCKTOMB.name: Rock Tomb
ROCKTOMB.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by preventing its movement.

ROCKTHROW.name: Rock Throw
ROCKTHROW.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

SMACKDOWN.name: Smack Down
SMACKDOWN.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

ACCELEROCK.name: Accelerock
ACCELEROCK.description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

ROLLOUT.name: Rollout
ROLLOUT.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

ROCKBLAST.name: Rock Blast
ROCKBLAST.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

ROCKPOLISH.name: Rock Polish
ROCKPOLISH.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

SANDSTORM.name: Sandstorm
SANDSTORM.description: Summons a five-turn sandstorm to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

STEALTHROCK.name: Stealth Rock
STEALTHROCK.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

TARSHOT.name: Tar Shot
TARSHOT.description: Pours sticky tar over the target, lowering its Speed and making it weaker to Fire-type moves.

WIDEGUARD.name: Wide Guard
WIDEGUARD.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for a turn. May fail if used in succession.

DOOMDESIRE.name: Doom Desire
DOOMDESIRE.description: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

STEELBEAM.name: Steel Beam
STEELBEAM.description: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

STEELROLLER.name: Steel Roller
STEELROLLER.description: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground isn't a terrain.

BEHEMOTHBASH.name: Behemoth Bash
BEHEMOTHBASH.description: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target.

BEHEMOTHBLADE.name: Behemoth Blade
BEHEMOTHBLADE.description: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target.

IRONTAIL.name: Iron Tail
IRONTAIL.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

SUNSTEELSTRIKE.name: Sunsteel Strike
SUNSTEELSTRIKE.description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. Can't be stopped by the target's Ability.

METEORMASH.name: Meteor Mash
METEORMASH.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user's Attack.

ANCHORSHOT.name: Anchor Shot
ANCHORSHOT.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain. The target becomes unable to flee.

FLASHCANNON.name: Flash Cannon
FLASHCANNON.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

IRONHEAD.name: Iron Head
IRONHEAD.description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

SMARTSTRIKE.name: Smart Strike
SMARTSTRIKE.description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

STEELWING.name: Steel Wing
STEELWING.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user's Defense stat.

DOUBLEIRONBASH.name: Double Iron Bash
DOUBLEIRONBASH.description: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes twice. May cause flinching.

MIRRORSHOT.name: Mirror Shot
MIRRORSHOT.description: The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

MAGNETBOMB.name: Magnet Bomb
MAGNETBOMB.description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack will not miss.

GEARGRIND.name: Gear Grind
GEARGRIND.description: The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target.

METALCLAW.name: Metal Claw
METALCLAW.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

BULLETPUNCH.name: Bullet Punch
BULLETPUNCH.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

GYROBALL.name: Gyro Ball
GYROBALL.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

HEAVYSLAM.name: Heavy Slam
HEAVYSLAM.description: The user slams into the foe with its heavy body. The heavier the user, the greater the damage.

METALBURST.name: Metal Burst
METALBURST.description: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.

AUTOTOMIZE.name: Autotomize
AUTOTOMIZE.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

GEARUP.name: Gear Up
GEARUP.description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk of allies with the Plus or Minus Ability.

IRONDEFENSE.name: Iron Defense
IRONDEFENSE.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

KINGSSHIELD.name: King's Shield
KINGSSHIELD.description: Protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack of attackers that make contact.

METALSOUND.name: Metal Sound
METALSOUND.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

SHIFTGEAR.name: Shift Gear
SHIFTGEAR.description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed.

HYDROCANNON.name: Hydro Cannon
HYDROCANNON.description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

WATERSPOUT.name: Water Spout
WATERSPOUT.description: The user spouts water to damage the foe. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful it becomes.

HYDROPUMP.name: Hydro Pump
HYDROPUMP.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

ORIGINPULSE.name: Origin Pulse
ORIGINPULSE.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

STEAMERUPTION.name: Steam Eruption
STEAMERUPTION.description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

CRABHAMMER.name: Crabhammer
CRABHAMMER.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

AQUATAIL.name: Aqua Tail
AQUATAIL.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

MUDDYWATER.name: Muddy Water
MUDDYWATER.description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

SPARKLINGARIA.name: Sparkling Aria
SPARKLINGARIA.description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any burnt Pokémon will be healed by these bubbles.

SURF.name: Surf
SURF.description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

FISHIOUSREND.name: Fishious Rend
FISHIOUSREND.description: The user rends the target with its hard gills. Power doubles if the user moves first.

LIQUIDATION.name: Liquidation
LIQUIDATION.description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. May lower the target's Defense.

DIVE.name: Dive
DIVE.description: Diving on the first turn, the user rises and hits on the next turn. It can be used to dive in the ocean.

SCALD.name: Scald
SCALD.description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

SNIPESHOT.name: Snipe Shot
SNIPESHOT.description: The user ignores any effects that redirect moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

WATERPLEDGE.name: Water Pledge
WATERPLEDGE.description: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, it makes a rainbow.

WATERFALL.name: Waterfall
WATERFALL.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

RAZORSHELL.name: Razor Shell
RAZORSHELL.description: The user cuts the foe with sharp shells. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

BRINE.name: Brine
BRINE.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

BUBBLEBEAM.name: Bubble Beam
BUBBLEBEAM.description: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. It may also lower its Speed stat.

OCTAZOOKA.name: Octazooka
OCTAZOOKA.description: The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe's face or eyes. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

FLIPTURN.name: Flip Turn
FLIPTURN.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

WATERPULSE.name: Water Pulse
WATERPULSE.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

AQUAJET.name: Aqua Jet
AQUAJET.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

BUBBLE.name: Bubble
BUBBLE.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

WATERGUN.name: Water Gun
WATERGUN.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

CLAMP.name: Clamp
CLAMP.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

WHIRLPOOL.name: Whirlpool
WHIRLPOOL.description: Traps foes in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

SURGINGSTRIKES.name: Surging Strikes
SURGINGSTRIKES.description: Hits three times in a row with mastery of the Water style. This attack always deals critical hits.

WATERSHURIKEN.name: Water Shuriken
WATERSHURIKEN.description: The user hits the target with throwing stars 2-5 times in a row. This move always goes first.

AQUARING.name: Aqua Ring
AQUARING.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

LIFEDEW.name: Life Dew
LIFEDEW.description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its allies.

RAINDANCE.name: Rain Dance
RAINDANCE.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

SOAK.name: Soak
SOAK.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

WATERSPORT.name: Water Sport
WATERSPORT.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

WITHDRAW.name: Withdraw
WITHDRAW.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

DIRECLAW.name: Dire Claw
DIRECLAW.description: The user may critically hit with its ruinous claws. May also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

SPRINGTIDESTORM.name: Springtide Storm
SPRINGTIDESTORM.description: The user wraps winds of fierce emotion around opponents. This may lower their Attack stats.

RAGINGFURY.name: Raging Fury
RAGINGFURY.description: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

WAVECRASH.name: Wave Crash
WAVECRASH.description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target. This also damages the user.

CHLOROBLAST.name: Chloroblast
CHLOROBLAST.description: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

MOUNTAINGALE.name: Mountain Gale
MOUNTAINGALE.description: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target. This may also make the target flinch.

HEADLONGRUSH.name: Headlong Rush
HEADLONGRUSH.description: The user rams into the target in a full-body tackle. This lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

BARBBARRAGE.name: Barb Barrage
BARBBARRAGE.description: Fires toxic barbs which may poison the target. Power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

ESPERWING.name: Esper Wing
ESPERWING.description: The user slashes with aura-enriched wings which boosts its Speed stat. Critical hits land more easily.

BITTERMALICE.name: Bitter Malice
BITTERMALICE.description: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

TRIPLEARROWS.name: Triple Arrows
TRIPLEARROWS.description: The user fires arrows which may lower the target’s Defense or make it flinch. Critical hits land more easily.

BLEAKWINDSTORM.name: Bleakwind Storm
BLEAKWINDSTORM.description: The user attacks with cold winds that cause opposing Pokémon to tremble. This may lower their Speed stats.

WILDBOLTSTORM.name: Wildbolt Storm
WILDBOLTSTORM.description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with a thunderous tempest. This may also leave them paralyzed.

SANDSEARSTORM.name: Sandsear Storm
SANDSEARSTORM.description: The user wraps fierce winds and hot sand around opponents. This may leave them with a burn.

LUNARBLESSING.name: Lunar Blessing
LUNARBLESSING.description: The user is blessed by the moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions of itself and allies.

PSYSHIELDBASH.name: Psyshield Bash
PSYSHIELDBASH.description: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This raises the user’s Defense.

POWERSHIFT.name: Power Shift
POWERSHIFT.description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats.

STONEAXE.name: Stone Axe
STONEAXE.description: The user swings at the opponent with its stone axes. May leave floating rocks around the target.

MYSTICALPOWER.name: Mystical Power
MYSTICALPOWER.description: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

VICTORYDANCE.name: Victory Dance
VICTORYDANCE.description: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, raising its Attack, Defense, and Speed.

SHELTER.name: Shelter
SHELTER.description: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

INFERNALPARADE.name: Infernal Parade
INFERNALPARADE.description: Hurls fireballs which may cause burns. Power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

CEASELESSEDGE.name: Ceaseless Edge
CEASELESSEDGE.description: The user slashes the opponent with its shell blade. May leave spikes around the target.

TAKEHEART.name: Take Heart
TAKEHEART.description: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

AQUACUTTER.name: Aqua Cutter
AQUACUTTER.description: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. Critical hits land more easily.

AQUASTEP.name: Aqua Step
AQUASTEP.description: The user attacks the target using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user’s Speed stat.

ARMORCANNON.name: Armor Cannon
ARMORCANNON.description: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.

AXEKICK.name: Axe Kick
AXEKICK.description: Performs a downward kick which may confuse the target. The user takes damage if it misses.

BITTERBLADE.name: Bitter Blade
BITTERBLADE.description: A spiteful slashing attack. The user’s HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

BLAZINGTORQUE.name: Blazing Torque
BLAZINGTORQUE.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may leave the target with a burn.

CHILLINGWATER.name: Chilling Water
CHILLINGWATER.description: The user showers the target with frigid water. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

CHILLYRECEPTION.name: Chilly Reception
CHILLYRECEPTION.description: The user tells a chillingly bad joke and switches out. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

COLLISIONCOURSE.name: Collision Course
COLLISIONCOURSE.description: A massive prehistoric explosion. This move’s power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

COMBATTORQUE.name: Combat Torque
COMBATTORQUE.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may paralyze the target.

COMEUPPANCE.name: Comeuppance
COMEUPPANCE.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

DOODLE.name: Doodle
DOODLE.description: The user captures a quick sketch, changing the Abilities of the user and its allies to the target's.

DOUBLESHOCK.name: Double Shock
DOUBLESHOCK.description: The user attacks by discharging all of its electricity. The user will no longer be Electric type.

ELECTRODRIFT.name: Electro Drift
ELECTRODRIFT.description: A futuristic electric strike. This move’s power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

FILLETAWAY.name: Fillet Away
FILLETAWAY.description: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

FLOWERTRICK.name: Flower Trick
FLOWERTRICK.description: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target, which always hits and lands a critical hit.

GIGATONHAMMER.name: Gigaton Hammer
GIGATONHAMMER.description: The user attacks with its huge hammer. This move can’t be used twice in a row.

GLAIVERUSH.name: Glaive Rush
GLAIVERUSH.description: The user becomes highly vulnerable to attacks until its next turn after using this move.

HYPERDRILL.name: Hyper Drill
HYPERDRILL.description: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target, ignoring protections.

ICESPINNER.name: Ice Spinner
ICESPINNER.description: The user spins into the target with feet covered in thin ice. This also destroys the terrain.

JETPUNCH.name: Jet Punch
JETPUNCH.description: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. Always goes first.

KOWTOWCLEAVE.name: Kowtow Cleave
KOWTOWCLEAVE.description: The user kowtows to make the target lower its guard, then slashes. This attack never misses.

LASTRESPECTS.name: Last Respects
LASTRESPECTS.description: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The move’s power increases for each defeated ally.

LUMINACRASH.name: Lumina Crash
LUMINACRASH.description: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar, mind-bending light that harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def.

MAGICALTORQUE.name: Magical Torque
MAGICALTORQUE.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may confuse the target.

MAKEITRAIN.name: Make It Rain
MAKEITRAIN.description: The user throws out a huge mass of coins, lowering its Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

MORTALSPIN.name: Mortal Spin
MORTALSPIN.description: Performs a spin that eliminates certain traps and hazards. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

NOXIOUSTORQUE.name: Noxious Torque
NOXIOUSTORQUE.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may poison the target.

ORDERUP.name: Order Up
ORDERUP.description: If used when the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, a boost occurs based on its form.

POPULATIONBOMB.name: Population Bomb
POPULATIONBOMB.description: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits one to ten times in a row.

POUNCE.name: Pounce
POUNCE.description: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

RAGEFIST.name: Rage Fist
RAGEFIST.description: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The move’s power increases every time the user is hit.

RAGINGBULL.name: Raging Bull
RAGINGBULL.description: The user charges and destroys enemy barriers. This move’s type depends on the user’s form.

REVIVALBLESSING.name: Revival Blessing
REVIVALBLESSING.description: The user revives a party Pokémon that has fainted and restores half their max HP.

RUINATION.name: Ruination
RUINATION.description: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

SALTCURE.name: Salt Cure
SALTCURE.description: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types take more damage.

SHEDTAIL.name: Shed Tail
SHEDTAIL.description: The user creates a substitute and switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

SILKTRAP.name: Silk Trap
SILKTRAP.description: User spins a silken trap to protect itself. Lowers the Speed of any that make direct contact.

SNOWSCAPE.name: Snowscape
SNOWSCAPE.description: Summons a five-turn snowstorm that boosts the Defense of Ice-type Pokémon.

SPICYEXTRACT.name: Spicy Extract
SPICYEXTRACT.description: Emits a spicy extract which raises the target’s Attack and lowers Defense by two stages each.

SPINOUT.name: Spin Out
SPINOUT.description: The user inflicts damage on the target with a furious spin. This harshly lowers the user’s Speed.

TIDYUP.name: Tidy Up
TIDYUP.description: Clears hazards and substitutes from the field. This also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed.

TORCHSONG.name: Torch Song
TORCHSONG.description: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song. This also boosts the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

TRAILBLAZE.name: Trailblaze
TRAILBLAZE.description: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. This boosts the user's Speed stat.

TRIPLEDIVE.name: Triple Dive
TRIPLEDIVE.description: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target three times in a row.

TWINBEAM.name: Twin Beam
TWINBEAM.description: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

WICKEDTORQUE.name: Wicked Torque
WICKEDTORQUE.description: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may put the target to sleep.

HYDROSTEAM.name: Hydro Steam
HYDROSTEAM.description: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water whose power is boosted in harsh sunlight.

PSYBLADE.name: Psyblade
PSYBLADE.description: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade whose power is boosted on Electric Terrain.

BLOODMOON.name: Blood Moon
BLOODMOON.description: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a blood moon. This move can't be used twice in a row.

MATCHAGOTCHA.name: Matcha Gotcha
MATCHAGOTCHA.description: Blasts opponents with hot tea. Heals the user by half the damage dealt and may also burn targets.

SYRUPBOMB.name: Syrup Bomb
SYRUPBOMB.description: An explosion of sticky candy syrup, which drop the target's Speed stat each turn for three turns.

IVYCUDGEL.name: Ivy Cudgel
IVYCUDGEL.description: An ivy-wrapped cudgel strike with a high critical-hit ratio. Type changes based on the user's Mask.

ELECTROSHOT.name: Electro Shot
ELECTROSHOT.description: A two-turn attack. The user boosts its Sp. Atk and then fires a high-voltage shot.

TERASTARSTORM.name: Tera Starstorm
TERASTARSTORM.description: When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

FICKLEBEAM.name: Fickle Beam
FICKLEBEAM.description: Sometimes all of the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling this move's power.

BURNINGBULWARK.name: Burning Bulwark
BURNINGBULWARK.description: Protects the user from attacks. Also burns any attacker that makes contact with the user.

THUNDERCLAP.name: Thunderclap
THUNDERCLAP.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

MIGHTYCLEAVE.name: Mighty Cleave
MIGHTYCLEAVE.description: The user cleaves the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

TACHYONCUTTER.name: Tachyon Cutter
TACHYONCUTTER.description: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

HARDPRESS.name: Hard Press
HARDPRESS.description: The target is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the target has left.

DRAGONCHEER.name: Dragon Cheer
DRAGONCHEER.description: The user raises its allies’ critical hit ratio with a draconic cry. This rouses Dragon types more.

ALLURINGVOICE.name: Alluring Voice
ALLURINGVOICE.description: Attacks using an angelic voice. This confuses the target if its stats have been raised this turn.

TEMPERFLARE.name: Temper Flare
TEMPERFLARE.description: The user attacks driven by frustration. Power increases if the user's previous move failed.

SUPERCELLSLAM.name: Supercell Slam
SUPERCELLSLAM.description: The user drops onto the target with its electrified body. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

PSYCHICNOISE.name: Psychic Noise
PSYCHICNOISE.description: Attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. Prevents the target from healing for two turns.

UPPERHAND.name: Upper Hand
UPPERHAND.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. Fails if the target isn't using a high priority move.

MALIGNANTCHAIN.name: Malignant Chain
MALIGNANTCHAIN.description: Wraps the target in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.
